name: Sherwood Extreme
description:
Looking for a high-speed, yet casual game where you can team up with friends and challenge a growing community? Grab your crossbow and spring into action!

Sherwood Extreme is a FREE outrageous arcade shooter where you save the kingdom as a hobby and team up with friends in beautiful low-poly environments. Zipping, swinging, goblin flinging, slow-mo sniping slaughter! Wishlist now!

KEY FEATURES

  • High-Speed Action - Use zip-lines, swinging ropes, bouncy mushrooms, and cannons to move through the air at top speeds while blowing up everything and one-shot killing everyone in your path, like a true hero.
  • Online Co-Op - Team up with friends to complete challenges and top the Leaderboards. Master each level through speed and precision to achieve your dream of being the best in the world at something!
  • Play Your Way - Enter the Hideout between levels to unlock outfits, weapons, and challenges. Execute your playstyle and make bold fashion statements on the battlefield!
  • Outrageous Adventure - Discover hidden secrets in every region of Sherwood kingdom, collecting chickens and shinies along the way. Encounter wacky goblin foes from Hobwaks to Lafrats. Don’t mess up, or they’ll mock your tactics and crush your fragile ego!

Wishlisting is the best and easiest way to help our indie game succeed!


Join a faction, play exclusive demos, and get involved in development at our Discord!
We are a small team of dreamers looking to our fans for motivation and ideas :)
@cagestudios on social media
